The year: over-year ratings drop during the second week of May 2018, as reported by Adweek, which showed a 29 percent decline in CNN's total-day viewership compared to the same period in 2017.
The celebratory notices and claims made: leaning websites such as Breitbart and Daily Caller, which routinely portray CNN as unreliable and purveyor of anti-Trump propaganda.
The exaggerated claim made by Your News: a partisan site known for blending fact and fiction, that CNN would soon be closing its doors due to "collapsing" ratings.
The fact that despite the decline in rat: CNN still remained the seventh most-watched cable network in terms of total-day viewership and the eleventh most-watched in prime time during the week in question.
